metadata.synopsis: The players may come across Mol's discarded eyepatch in the Necromancer Chamber in the Upper Colony. They will react to it appropriately, depending on whether they ever met Mol or not.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Head to Colony, the most useful command for this is "oe Necromancer_AssaultDead"- Interact with the eyepatch on the table for this PAD to play: S_COL_NecromancerLab_MolEyepatch_fa9baba1-f855-449c-8327-9728a493b193- For the Mol HasMet flag, use ReCon command "SetGlobalOsirisFlag DEN_Thieflings_HasMet_Mol_68ac20be-b47c-4270-8da2-24436d4c4bb9"

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This is Mol's eyepatch - what's become of her?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: An eyepatch. Wonder who it belongs to - or belonged to.
